recommended_degree: Manajemen Pemasaran/Marketing, Bisnis, Manajemen Bisnis, Ilmu Komunikasi, Komunikasi (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Design and implement effective analytics studies to review the successful achievement of a company's business objectives.
- Review marketing analytics data and cross reference with additional data sets to assess performance of customer, product or marketing performance
- Perform independent advanced analysis such as attribution modeling on various digital platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and others.
- Compile regular reports on business performance such as top performing products, margin optimization, CLV and CAC and deliver results and recommendations to management and  client stakeholders.
- Collaborate with data scientists and data engineers to ensure data pipelines are updated, data sets are accurate and valuable insights can be generated and shared to clients
